feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.2
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.1...v5.109.2

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.3
entry.content:
• 🔧 Removed stdout from default production logging options - Ricardo Pinto
  • 🌐 Updated Slovenian translations - martinverbic
  • 🌐 Updated Catalan transaltions - Àlex Rodríguez Bacardit
  • 🌐 Updated Brazilian Portuguese translations - Mateus Ribeiro
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations - Duy
  • 🌐 Updated Turkish translations - echobilisim3421

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.2...v5.109.3

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.109.5
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed invalid routes.yaml filter preventing Ghost from booting (#22174) - Michael Barrett

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.109.4...v5.109.5
